abstract: National Intelligence Dir James R Clapper Jr says review to declassify contentious 28 pages of Sept 11 report could be concluded by June; demands have mounted for disclosure that some say could establish Saudi role in attacks.
lead_paragraph: Amid speculation about a Saudi role in the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks, several lawmakers have joined victims’ families in pushing for declassification.

headline.main: Classified Pages From 9/11 Report Could Be Released by Summer
headline.print_headline: Part of 9/11 Report May Be Declassified

snippet: Amid speculation about a Saudi role in the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks, several lawmakers have joined victims’ families in pushing for declassification.
